Type Property# byLines

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static var byLines: NSString.EnumerationOptions { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSString/EnumerationOptions/byLines#Discussion)

Enumerates by lines. Equivalent to [`lineRange(for:)`](/documentation/foundation/nsstring/linerange(for:)).
